revisionDesc.change: Finalized - This is good to go.
Add dummy header for original identifier 'papyri.info/ddbdp/p.oxy;2;380' pointing to new identifier 'papyri.info/ddbdp/zpe;177;226_2'
Vote - Accept-Straight-to-Finalization - Yes. Will rename and add redirect
Vote - AcceptText - See Sosin's comments and add: l1: => <#πρώτου=1#> l10: => [ca.8] l14: => add num tags.

Vote - AcceptText - Accept. lin1--> <:Καίσαρος|subst|καισαρου:> ; Lin2--> ἐπαγομένων <#¯ϛ¯=6#>,]; lin2 --> <#¯ϛ¯=6#>; lin7 use proper dbl sq brackets; λιν11--⟩ lin11--> <:διεσταμένη̣ν|subst|διεσ.2μενη̣ν:> ; lin12 text has Σαραποῦτ]ο̣ς̣(?), suggesting --> ] [Σαραποῦτ(?)]ο̣ς̣, but neither translation nor commentary (nor sense, I'd have thought) reflect doubt. So, I propose leaving as Benaissa has entered. Lin13--> ca.20; lin14--> <:τ[α]λάντων|reg|τ̣[ά]λ̣α̣ν̣τα:> δ̣έκα <:τρισχιλίων|reg|τρισχείλιαι:>
Entered text from full edition of papyrus in ZPE 177 (2011) 226-8. I've also entered relevant new information in HGV (under 'other publication', 'translation', 'Abbildung', and 'collection').
changed schema; added xml:space=preserve; indented; moved title/@n to idno
Converted from TEI P4 (EpiDoc DTD v. 6) to P5 (EpiDoc RNG schema)
